hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"I used to perform Ghusl with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) from one vessel, which was the size of a Faraq

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الدِّلاَلَةِ عَلَى أَنَّهُ لاَ وَقْتَ فِي ذَلِكَ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Evidence That There Is No Set Limit For That
